OK LISTEN EVERYONE!!! The only reason why you see Windows Media Center Edition ver. 2002 srvice pack 2 in the my computer properties is because, Windows Xp Pro. is MCE!!! MCE is based on Xp Pro. So My computer is trying to say windows Xp Pro. Version 2002 NOT MCE 2002. This Version is 2005 beacaue when you follow this route in the registry,HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Media Center you will see the num. 3.0 for the key called, Ident.  If it says, 2.7 then its MCE 2002. if its 2.8, its MCE 2004. if its 3.0, its MCE 2005. if its 3.1 or 4.0, then its MCE 2005 with rollup 1 or 2 or both. if its 5.0, its Vista Media Center. So now You Know This Is Media Center 2005. Thanks Man For The Great Upload
Thank you Alex.....
